reviews.customers_say: Customers love this Irish cardigan for its beautiful cable knit design, soft wool, and warm, heavy construction.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEAUTIFUL SWEATER / JACKET
items.body: Gorgeous! Wearing it over T-shirts or lightweight wool sweaters. This is just right. Not bulky, not heavy, done beautifully. Honestly, have worn it every single day since I received it. I did same with another Irish sweater ordered last year. This one was described as a jacket rather than as a sweater, so perhaps knitted a bit more densely? I wouldn't know. XL perfect fit for a long torso 5'6" 150lbs. Hits mid-hip/bum or a bit lower. It's so comfortable. Order a wool scarf to go with! Read more
items.author: California Girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very warm
items.body: Great sweater! Beautiful! Keeps me very warm in 10 degree weather! Read more
items.author: J

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looking for warmth? Check out this sweater.
items.body: I like just about everything about this sweater. My only complaint is that I experienced itchiness when wearing this sweater over bare arms. The color is as described, pattern beautiful, and it is top quality. I purchased this sweater ahead of time for a planned vacation to Northern Canada this fall. I am planning to layer it over cotton blend turtle necks, and under a lined windbreaker. Temperatures during the day are expected to be in the forties and fifties, (and windy) and to dip down to freezing , or even colder, at night. I expect it to work out well for daily sightseeing excursions. I will alternate between this and a down filled vest for the cooler days and evenings. It will go beautifully when paired with a pair of jeans, and also work with my dressier wool blend slacks in gray and navy. I will also pack light weight wool underwear which can also be worn if an additional layer is needed. An additional, lighter weight sweater, and a fleece top will round out my wardrobe, and hopefully all fit in one medium size suitcase. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and warm.
items.body: Excellent outdoor wool cardigan. I think XL would fit a little better, but this fits okay. Looser weave than some Aran Woolen Mills sweaters. I love it, goes with most colors. Hand washable. Informal. Read more
items.author: sandra a smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Irish sweater
items.body: It’s not only warm, it’s beautiful and I love it. After months of shopping for the absolute perfect sweater, I found this gem. I am so glad I choose this one. It’s hand knitted, and well done at that. The fit is perfect. The feel is softer than other wools. I wear it with tshirts without irritation. I have received so many complaints on it! Read more
items.author: Shannon F.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful And soft
items.author: hugh dean

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lovely and cozy UPDATE: but not high quality
items.body: Lovely sweater, will be quite cozy as the weather gets colder. Don't buy it for the pockets--you can fit a tissue but nothing else in there, especially not your hands. I was worried the sleeves would be too short, but they are just right. It's a nice merino and the blue is perfect. It's a bit boxier than I'd like but I guess I could put on a few pounds to fill it out (I'm 5'8" and 125 pounds, bought size Large). UPDATE Dec 2017: After wearing this sweater for awhile, I had to deduct a star because the quality of the yarn is so awful. It is pilled terribly after wearing it indoors only for a few weeks (and not every day). It also sheds fibers so that I have blue dust bunnies EVERYWHERE. Simply awful. I didn't think Merino did this. Very disappointed. Will probably donate it to shelter. Read more
items.author: bloop

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Denim Marl, Rich Red, Natural, Charcoal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
